name: Glimmers of the Past
description:
Greetings. Welcome to Glimmers of the Past - an interactive exhibition of the most recent electro-archeological discoveries from our home planet: Earth.

Broadcast live to you from the archives on Proxima Centauri b.

Features

The game was developed for O2A2 Jam and contains 978 words, one background and one sprite. It features full voice acting.

Credits
  • Eishelin - writing, programming, photo editing
  • RitaRemixed - voice acting
  • Bryth - editing
Special thanks to
  • Sprite by ささとや on Booth
  • CC Music - Please wake up by Meydän
Install instructions

Note: If playing the web version on mobile, it's recommended to enable your phone's auto-rotation and play in landscape mode. If you experience transition lag with the web version, please consider downloading the game instead.

To install the game, choose the file that's labeled for your computer's operating system, extract, and click the icon labeled 'Glimmers of the Past' to start the game!

If you're on MacOS, you may get a warning that reads: "'Glimmers of the Past' cannot be opened because the developer cannot be verified." Instead of moving the file to trash as the pop-up window suggests, you can allow the app to run in the General tab of your Security & Privacy settings.
